epilogue.gender: "male", "female", or "any". This is the gender of player that can see the ending
epilogue.title: This is the title of the character's ending, and the start of a new ending

screen.img: filename (including extension) of the background image for a screen. Also the start of a new screen

text.x: The x-position of the text box. Specifically, the position of the text box's left side. This can be a percentage, or the word "centered"
text.y: The y-position of the top of the text box. Must be a percentage.
text.width: The width of a text box. This is optional. Must be a percentage.
text.arrow: "up", "down", "left", or "right". Gives the text box a dialogue arrow in the specified direction. Can be left out, if ya don't want the text box to be an arrow.
text.content: The text in the text box.
This is text that will be seen by the player. It has a width of 34% and an arrow pointing down.
This is a centered text box. It has the default width and an arrow pointing right.
This third text box has minimum amount of values specified. It uses the default width, and has no arrow.
